name: Confessions (itch)
description:
Game made for the College for Creative Studies 48 HR Challenge by Brianna Peterson, Jake Byers, Rebecca Paul, Michael Caruso, Morgan Cooney, and Abi Wysokowski.  Based on the prompt "Confessions", you play in an interactive story in which a neighborhood's residents confess some of their deepest secrets.

-HOW TO PLAY-

-Use WASD to move around, and the mouse to look.

-Use the  Spacebar to jump.

-Press ESC to pause the game. 

Voices in order by: Morgan Cooney, Jake Byers, Rebecca Paul, Grover Cox, and Caitlin Manchester.
